DataElement.preferredName: Skin Rash Patient Self-Report Personal Medical History Yes or No Response
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any change in the skin which affects its appearance or texture. A rash may be localised to one part of the body, or affect all the skin. Rashes may cause the skin to change color, itch, become warm, bumpy, dry, cracked or blistered, swell and may be painful. Subjective reports made by a patient. An account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced. A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

An account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: Any change in the skin which affects its appearance or texture. A rash may be localized to one part of the body, or affect all the skin. Rashes may cause the skin to change color, itch, become warm, bumpy, dry, cracked or blistered, swell and may be painful.

Property.preferredDefinition: Subjective reports made by the patient:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: Subjective reports made by a patient.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
